.. _get-started:

==================
How to get started
==================

To use Colosseum, create a new virtual environment, and install it::

    $ python3 -m venv venv
    $ source venv/bin/activate.sh
    (venv) $ pip install colosseum

You're now ready to use Colosseum! Your next step is to work through the
:ref:`tutorial`, which will take you step-by-step through your first steps
and introduce you to the important concepts you need to become familiar
with.
